page.title: 04CLUBS
page.content: There is a wide variety of {Clubs}in Lanark reflecting a vibrant community.Some of these are quite large and put on public { {entertainments }like the Lanark Panto club and the Lanark Operatic Society.Other clubs invite outside entertainers like the Lanark Music Club.Some clubs provide {Community {Services}like the Round Table and the Rotary club.Other clubs providethe opportunity for people to get together and discuss things like the Ladies and Men's Speakers clubs.There are { {Activity Clubs}like the Lanark Civic Trust ,the photographic Society,the Scottish Wildlife Trust and the Lanark and District Archaeological Society,where the emphasis is more on outdoor activities or issues of local concern.
